args.prompt: Run a quick OSINT sweep on current cybersecurity, geopolitical, and darknet chatter. Summarize key threats, anomalies, and emerging trends for the last hour. Use web_osint_scan, web_news_brief, and discord_search_history if relevant.
Use gog_gmail_read to pull important and unread emails from the last 24 hours, cluster them by topic, and produce an actionable Gmail summary with tasks and deadlines.
Run quick automation checks (log health, pending GitHub notifications, high-priority emails). If there is anything urgent, send a short alert to Telegram. If nothing critical, output NO_REPLY.
